roemetz.core

Class CalcGenRoeMetz

  • java.lang.Object
    • roemetz.core.CalcGenRoeMetz

  • public class CalcGenRoeMetz
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates product moments from a generalized Roe and Metz model that allows for differerent variances for each truth state and modality. Adapted for java from cofv_genroemetz.pro (Brandon D. Gallas, PhD)
    Author:
    Rohan Pathare

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Used when calling CalGenRoeMetz as a standalone application via command-line.
        Parameters:
        args - command-line arguments. First element is experiment means, second element is components of variance, third element is experiment sizes

      • printResults

        private static void printResults()
        Prints the results of a simulation experiment to standard out. Only used when main method for this class is invoked.

      • getBDGdata

        public static double[][] getBDGdata()
        Get BDG decomposition of calculated variance components
        Returns:
        BDG decomposition

      • prodMoment1

        public static double prodMoment1(double[] u,
                 double[] scale,
                 int numSamples)
        Numerically integrates a one dimensional gaussian pdf times two normal cdfs
        Parameters:
        u - Contains experiment means
        scale - Contains one 1-D gaussian pdf and two 2-D normal cdfs
        numSamples - Number of samples for numerical integration
        Returns:
        Integrated product moment

      • prodMoment

        public static double prodMoment(double[] u,
                double[] scale,
                int numSamples)
        Numerically integrates a two dimensional gaussian pdf times a gaussian cdf
        Parameters:
        u - Contains experiment means.
        scale - Contains 2-D gaussian pdf and cdf
        numSamples - Number of samples for numerical integration
        Returns:
        Integrated product moment

      • genRoeMetz

        public static void genRoeMetz(double[] u,
              double[] var_t,
              long[] n)
        Calculates AUC components of variance for given experiment parameters via numerical integration
        Parameters:
        u - Contains experiment means. Has 2 elements.
        var_t - Contains variance components. Has 18 elements.
        n - Contains experiment sizes. Has 3 elements.

      • calcAUCsAndDecomps

        public static void calcAUCsAndDecomps(long n0,
                      long n1,
                      long nr)
        Calculates AUCs and decompositions of components of variance from moment matrix according to experiment size
        Parameters:
        n0 - Number of normal cases
        n1 - Number of disease cases
        nr - Number of readers
